lines.text:
[speaking really fast]
Guess what? You'll never guess what, I'll betcha! Uncle Cornelius said I could go with you on your ramble today, but I'll betcha he's forgotten all about it, & I'll never, EVER get to see what the big surprise is!
[inhales deeply]
What took you so long?
My dad!
My mother!
No breakfast!
Well, what do you have to say?
Uh... sorry we're late?
Uncle Cornelius, your mouth is hanging open!

[tapping a road with his foot]
This ground isn't normal. It's hard.

[sniffing the road]
And it smells kind of funny!

[pushing the tiller of a reed boat]
I get to steer!

[pushing the tiller back]
Don't be silly, you'll sink us!

[pushing back]
Will NOT! Give me a chance!
This isn't a picnic! Here! Pack something useful!
[Abigail tosses Russell a rope]
Boy, I've been working up an appetite!
We're going to climb?
We can't DIG our way up!
You were right, Edgar. I was wrong. Thanks for coming to my rescue!
[sniffles]
What about me? I broke your fall!
You too, Russell!
You know, Abigail, sometimes I wish I was brave... like you.
You are.
Gee, & I thought meals were ALWAYS out of control at MY house!
How are we gonna get anybody to help us find the herbs?
Maybe these guys won't be so grouchy after they eat.
Well, we can't wait that long!
Aha! NOW the truth comes out! They're just here to steal our food!
No, we're just looking for lungwort & eyebright.
Liar!
It's true! We need the herbs to heal a sick badger back home!
More lies! Why would a mole, a mouse, and a hedgehog want to help a foul-smelling, worm-eating, good-for-nothing badger?
Michelle's none of those things. She's our friend, understand? And we've come too far to be stopped now. Step aside!

[laughing]
Just like a hedgehog, with a big mouth and no brains.
Wait a minute! I know how to get up there. We'll use Cornelius' Flapper-Wing-A-Ma-Thing.
Russell, good thinking! We'll FLY to the top of the cliff!
You don't really mean "fly"?
You heard 'em, Willy. They'll flap their little paws & fly like birdies.
[laughing]
Uncle Cornelius, why do you look so sad?
My goodness!
Michelle!
Oh, Michelle! You're all right!
Of course, I am! I just had...
[yawns]
... a long nap!
What's that?
Great Honk!
[sees the Flapper-Wing-A-Ma-Thing]
My Flapper-Wing-A-Ma-Thing! But how did you get it here?
We built it.
And we flew it!
Marvelous! Magnificent! Stupendous! You three have changed so much these past few days, I hardly recognize you.
[happily]
You're no longer my Furlings. You've grown up.
Oh, Edgar! When we ran from the gas, I was worried sick about you! Did you forget your scarf somewhere?
No, Mama. This is what I forgot.
[Edgar kisses his mama]
Look, Uncle Cornelius! All the mommies & daddies are coming back!
Not all of them, my dear. I'll never be able to replace your mummy & daddy, but I'll do my best.
[Michelle sniffles]
I guess nothing will ever be the same again, will it, Uncle Cornelius?
Well, my dear, if we all work as hard to save Dapplewood as your three friends worked to save you, it will.
I'll have you know that when I was a Furling, I couldn't WAIT to get to Cornelius' class!
Yes, daddy!
Well, at least he's taught you to behave! But you never stop climbing trees!
Yes, daddy!
Good thing you're a slow climber!
Is there a ray of hope?

[in unison]
A ray of hope?

[imitating Phineas]
Yes, there is a ray of hope! Brothers & sisters, we can SAVE Bosworth!
HALLELUJAH!
You'll find some more, Russell. That's never been a problem for you!
That's true...
Gosh, I hope I didn't hurt you.
Me? No, I'm fine.
You're not from around here, are you?
[shakes her head no]
Well, Furlings, there are times when we must learn to accept... setbacks.
Looks like one of those times, doesn't it?
I can hardly see him behind his papers. He must be working on an experiment.
Good. Maybe he won't notice we're late.
I bet he's working on the big surprise, I'll betcha!
Oh, I LOVE surprises! Let's have a look!
Russell, your mouth is hanging open!
Oh, I want to fly it! PLEASE?
Don't be silly, you'll crash it!
Correct, Abigail. It's far too delicate for Furlings.
Huh? I didn't mean me!
My friends & I are lost, and...
Say no more, child! We, too, are lost! Lost in our grief!
What's he squawking about?
Shhhh... someone's died.
Oh...
For all the good it'll do you, I'd like to see YOU get the lungwort! No one in Oakdale's ever been able to reach it! But I'll bet you three can!
That's right! We've already got a plan, right, Edgar?
I don't know.
You've been leading long enough, now it's MY turn!
You probably don't even know where you're going!
Maybe YOU don't know where you're going, but I do!
[falls onto a road]
Come on, we'd better hurry!
If Uncle Cornelius asks, tell him it isn't MY fault you're late!
I guess we wrecked the big surprise.
No, you just wrecked months & months of work!
Uncle Cornelius, what's "ru-rumertism"?
Rheumatism, Michelle.
[his back snaps]
Russell, you are one lucky hedgehog. It's far too rare for a Furling to survive an encounter with... with...
A monster?
That is a good name for it.

[whining]
Mom, they won't give me a chance for breakfast!

[washing dishes]
Well, you'll just have to be quicker, Rollin!

[annoyed]
I'm not Rollin, Mother! I'm Russell! RUSSELL!
Oh dear heavens, not here.
What happened? Where is everyone? MOMMY! DADDY!
Michelle!
[to Furlings]
We must stop her! It's not safe!
